FuncDef: The check logfile command checks whether a specified log file is tampered with. The check logfile command checks whether a specified log file is tampered with.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a log file path.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters in the [ drive ][ path ][ file-name ] format.

ExtraInfo: To verify whether a specified log file has been tampered with, run the verify logfile command.
